name: Seattle

authority.name: Seattle Municipal Court Parking Violations
authority.serves_description: Parking citations issued by the City of Seattle are adjudicated by the Seattle Municipal Court.

citation_pattern.notes: City citations may show a combination of letters and numbers; format varies.

submission_methods.notes: Contested citations may be submitted online, by mail, or in person at the Seattle Municipal Court.

phone_confirmation.purpose: Confirm this is the correct mailing address and procedure for contesting City of Seattle parking citations.

verification.source_note: Seattle Municipal Court Hearings by Mail page lists PO Box 34987, Seattle, WA 98124-4987 for written statements and provides phone 206-684-5600【610708974160281†L197-L213】.

official_confirmation_purpose: Confirm Phase-1 appeal mailing addresses and issuing authority routing.
qa_blocking_issues: University of Washington, Seattle University, and Seattle Pacific University sections lack confirmed mailing addresses or require online-only appeals; confirmation by phone is needed to verify routing.
qa_known_gaps: Citation number patterns are based on general assumptions due to lack of published formats.
South Seattle College and Seattle Central College were not researched; additional campus authorities may exist.
King County District Court and other regional entities may issue parking citations, but their appeal processes were not included.
